title: Python Level 8 â€” Dictionaries & Tuples
intro: This level teaches key-value data with dictionaries and immutable sequences with tuples.
points: Create dictionaries and access values by key.
Add, update, and delete key-value pairs.
Loop over keys, values, and items in dictionaries.
Understand tuples as immutable ordered collections.
Use dictionaries and tuples to model real-world data.
